SEARCH
Package camppkg

Class Slots

java.lang.Object
camppkg.Slots
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AttendeeSlots, CCMemberSlots
public abstract class Slots extends Object implements Serializable
Class of Slots Information. Stores the details of the slots available for a role.
See Also:
